column5: At the trailer park. Kids were playing at the beach. I decided to try for bluegill off the dock. Got nothing after 15 minutes or so. If course my 5 year old had to come join. I give him the rod.  And on his first cast he hooks a nice little largie. He fights it and lands it himself. He loves to lip fish. Good job Alex.
That's pretty awesome Curt Way to go Alex Million dollar smile right there
And off a worm too! Good job!
first cast? He's got the luck...keep him nearby at ALL times!!
It was actually a 2" plastic minnow on a 1/16oz jig under a float.
Then I tried my luck at bass in the boat just off from the dock. Couldn't out fish him.
